coreAttributes.name: LAR1A1
coreAttributes.description: A light automatic rifle, capable of semi-automatic fire and taking 20-round detachable box magazines of 7.62Ã—51mm NATO ammunition. The gas-operated action is driven by a short-stroke, spring-loaded piston housed above the barrel, and is capable of producing a fire rate of around 700 RPM.
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: Use your LAR1A1 to fire a single bullet at your target.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out [npc.her] LAR1A1, inserts a magazine, and pulls the charging handle, putting it into a state where it's ready to be used in combat.

hitDescriptions.hitText:
Taking aim with [npc.her] LAR1A1, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger and [npc.verb(fire)] a bullet at [npc2.name], hitting [npc2.herHim] directly in the chest!
Thankfully, there seems to be some kind of arcane force preventing [npc2.name] from being seriously wounded or killed...

missDescriptions.missText: Taking aim with [npc.her] LAR1A1, [npc.name] [npc.verb(pull)] the trigger and fires a bullet at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
